scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:stop && npm run dev
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf src/shared && ln -sf ../../shared src/shared && if [ -d dist/backend/src ]; then cp -r dist/backend/src/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/backend; fi
scripts.test:critical: rm -rf src/shared && cp -r ../shared src/ && jest critical --runInBand && rm -rf src/shared && ln -sf ../../shared src/shared
scripts.test:integration: rm -rf src/shared && cp -r ../shared src/ && jest integration --runInBand && rm -rf src/shared && ln -sf ../../shared src/shared
scripts.test:stories: rm -rf src/shared && cp -r ../shared src/ && jest stories && rm -rf src/shared && ln -sf ../../shared src/shared
scripts.test:all: rm -rf src/shared && cp -r ../shared src/ && jest --runInBand && rm -rf src/shared && ln -sf ../../shared src/shared
scripts.test:watch: rm -rf src/shared && cp -r ../shared src/ && jest critical --watch
scripts.test:coverage: rm -rf src/shared && cp -r ../shared src/ && jest --coverage critical integration && rm -rf src/shared && ln -sf ../../shared src/shared
